meta_description.text: Resident Evil 2 is a 2019 survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. people_also_ask.question: Is Resident Evil 2 a good game?
people_also_ask.heading: It's an intense, terrifying experience that rebuilds the game from scratch and doesn't at all feel out of place on high-end modern hardware. But it preserves enough of the source material to feel like a respectful tribute. The result is one of the best games in the Resident Evil series.22-Jan-2019
people_also_ask.title: Resident Evil 2 review - The Verge

people_also_ask.question: Is Resident Evil 2 scary?
people_also_ask.heading: The Resident Evil 2 Remake is one of the scariest games to come out in recent years. Sure, you could say it's because of the monsters or the zombie-like theme, but what really makes this game stand out in the horror genre are the mechanics behind the scares. ... Design-wise this game is marvel of mechanical ingenuity.18-Mar-2020
people_also_ask.title: 10 Scariest Things In The Resident Evil 2 Remake - TheGamer
